column2: November 1]], [[1964]]) is an American comedian, actor and voice actor. He appeared on screen in series as ''[[wikipedia:Veronica Mars
column3: Veronica Mars]]'' and ''[[wikipedia:Ned's Declassified School Survival Guide
column4: Ned's Declassified School Survival Guide]]'', while notable voice roles include Cosmo on ''[[wikipedia:Fairly OddParents
column5: Fairly OddParents]]'' and Dick Daring on ''[[wikipedia:The Replacements (TV series)
column6: The Replacements]]''. He is married to [[Mary Elizabeth McGlynn]].
